name: Yakuza Cats (Bivium)
description:
We are a small team that works with independent creators to provide you with original narratives and colorful worlds. Yakuza Cats it's our first project out of college so we hope you enjoy it and give us all your feedback, we strive to keep improving and give you the best gaming experience.
Thank you for playing!
Find more about us and our future projects on Instagram, Twitter and Facebook

Meet the Team:

- Director, Writer and Art Director: Alessandra Pinto

- Executive Producer, Co-Director, Co-Programmer: Felipe García

- Lead Programmer: Kevin Hernandez

- Artist: Ana M.

- Musician: Ian Wong
